Regards,

Brendan Main

Hello Brenan & Daniel

We have the DNS record for SPF
Can you try sending an email and let me know if you still have an issue
Kind Regards,

Jatin Vamja
Inventory Manager





13 Pullman Place, Emu Plains NSW 2750



0490 934 885



DuraCube



DuraCube

Hi Jatin,

I hope all is well.

Sure, Can you verify now?

Hello

Can you please look into this?

It may be because recently I asked you to add a DNS record.
Please do not delete any DNS record related to Mailgun
Kind Regards,
Jatin Vamja
Inventory Manager
13 Pullman Place, Emu Plains NSW 2750
0490 934 885
DuraCube
DuraCube


---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Brendan Main <brendan@bjmit.com.au>
Date: Wed, Mar 26, 2025 at 9:27 AM
Subject: Fix your duracube.com.au SPF record for Google email services
To: renee.power@duracube.com.au <renee.power@duracube.com.au>, jatin.vamja@duracube.com.au <jatin.vamja@duracube.com.au>
Cc: Daniel Vermazen <danielv@jointly.com.au>


Hey Renee and Jatin

Please forward to your IT or email/domain DNS provider to fix ASAP as your emails are being blocked, I am the IT provider for Jointly and the email you sent to him has been blocked as it failed this email security check

Your emails are failing SPF, update your SPF record accordingly https://support.google.com/a/answer/10684623?hl=en as they are failing to get through to my customer you are sending emails to

You can only have 1 SPF record

Update your SPF record to the following ASAP to fix
  • v=spf1 ip4:35.189.58.105 include:_spf.google.com include:mailgun.org -all

Google email services failing the requirements check
  • https://toolbox.googleapps.com/apps/checkmx/check?domain=duracube.com.au&dkim_selector=
